name: suburban
trans: relating to an area near a large city

name: charge
trans: the amount of electricity that an electrical device stores or carries

name: embrace
trans: to accept something with great interest or enthusiasm

name: flair
trans: style or elegance

name: span
trans: to extend across in space or time

name: fume
trans: a cloud of fine particles suspended in a gas

name: urban
trans: of or in a city or town

name: rural
trans: in, of, or like the country (= land not in cities)

name: sprawl
trans: to spread out esp. awkwardly over a large area

name: consume
trans: to use fuel, energy, or time, esp. in large amounts

name: hamper
trans: to make an action intended to achieve something more difficult

name: standard
trans: usual or expected; not involving something special or extra

name: plodding
trans: (of movement) slow and laborious

name: monetary
trans: relating to money, esp. the money supply of a country

name: incentive
trans: something that encourages a person to do something

name: appeal
trans: to be interesting or attractive

name: markedly
trans: in a clearly noticeable manner

name: accelerate
trans: to move more quickly, or to make something happen faster or sooner

name: commuter
trans: someone who regularly travels between work and home

name: classify
trans: to divide things into groups according to type
